snippet: GUTTERMAN--Shirley, 86, of Boca Raton, Florida, formerly of Woodbury, NY. Loving Wife of the late Stewart. Adored Mother of Jeffrey and Russet, Robin and Peter, Philip and Ellen. Amazing Nana of Lucas and Maxwell. Cherished Step-Grandmother and Gr...
lead_paragraph: GUTTERMAN--Shirley, 86, of Boca Raton, Florida, formerly of Woodbury, NY. Loving Wife of the late Stewart. Adored Mother of Jeffrey and Russet, Robin and Peter, Philip and Ellen. Amazing Nana of Lucas and Maxwell. Cherished Step-Grandmother and Great-Grandmother to the Waxman and DiSanto Families. Shirley will be greatly missed by all her family and many great friends in both Boca Raton and New York. Rest in Peace. Services Thursday, July 7, 12 Noon at "Gutterman's", 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY. 1/3
